rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: This class is both extremely fascinating and challenging; I didn't know anything about computational genetics before, but I'm now interested in pursuing this important discipline of biology in the future. Dr. Vision uses a lot of interesting examples to explain complex (and potentially boring) topics. He is clear, fair, and obviously passionate.
